content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I unsuccessfully attempted to use the "list_files" command on the non-existent directory "/path/to/directory". However, I successfully used the "read_file" command to read the contents of the file at "/path/to/file", which returned "This is the new text to replace the old text with. This is the text to append to the file."
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_python_code", "args": {"code": "print(\'Hello, world!\')", "basename": "hello_world.py"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command execute_python_code returned: Hello, world!\n', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "best places to visit in Europe"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command google returned: ["https://travel.usnews.com/rankings/best-europe-vacations/", "https://www.touropia.com/best-places-to-visit-in-europe/", "https://www.cntraveller.com/gallery/places-to-visit-europe", "https://www.forbes.com/sites/ceciliarodriguez/2023/02/10/the-20-best-places-in-europe-to-visit-in-2023-according-to-european-best-destinations/", "https://santorinidave.com/best-cities-europe", "https://www.forbes.com/sites/ceciliarodriguez/2022/02/13/ready-for-europe-the-20-best-and-safest-places-for-travel-and-tourism--in-2022-according-to-european-best-destinations/", "https://tourscanner.com/blog/best-places-to-visit-in-europe/", "https://www.ourescapeclause.com/best-cities-to-visit-in-europe/"]', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "get_hyperlinks", "args": {"url": "https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Main_Page"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Failure: command get_hyperlinks returned too much output.                         Do not execute this command again with the same arguments.', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "replace_in_file", "args": {"filename": "/path/to/file", "old_text": "This is the new text to replace the old text with.", "new_text": "This is the newest text to replace the old text with.", "occurrence_index": 0}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command replace_in_file returned: File /path/to/file updated successfully.', type='action_result')]
"""
